agentAbility.name: Spectre Gunship
agentAbility.description: Call in the assistance of AC-130H Specter gunship. It comes equipped with a 40mm autocannon and a limited amount of ammunition for its precision 105mm gun. Take control of the weapon systems and deliver its firepower to where it's needed most.

primaryAttack.name: Autocannon
primaryAttack.description: Fires small-caliber armor-piercing rounds lethal to light armored vehicles. Effective against flying vessels.

tankAbilities.name: MIM-146 Missiles
tankAbilities.description: Activate the vehicle's missiles and prepare them for Anti-Tank use. After a short preparation time, the vehicle can launch several ATGM missiles at targets with increased penetration but slow projectile speed.

tankAbilities.name: LOS-F-H Air Defense
tankAbilities.description: Activate the vehicle's missile launchers and prepare them to engage Unarmored Targets, such as aerial threats. After a short preparation time, the vehicle can target multiple enemies simultaneously, provided they remain in view while the missiles fly towards them. In this mode, the missiles have reduced penetration, but increased speed and deal splash damage.
